attributes.action: No fishing areas, more trees, renewable fuels, efficient food production
attributes.additional_details: We only have 12 years to do somthing about this
attributes.background:
No fishing areas mean to restore the population of fish

Plant more trees to have better air and more wild life

Renewable fuels like solar panels and no fossil fuels

Efficent food production to  cut down on meat and use less land which will reduce  deforestation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions on the issues you raise. You might want to sign one or more of these if they call for things you want to happen. You're more likely to get action on these issues if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259845

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254607

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241100

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258866
